content: purl to last 4 sts k4 continue knitting in stocking stitch working a 4 stitch garter stitch border at each edge of the cardigan until it measures r ows 7-9 repeat row 5 and 6 and then row 5 once more a pproximately 3 /7 5cms from the underarm r ow 10 ws k2 yo k2tog purl to last 4 sts k4 knit 6 row c ast off row 11 17 repeat row 5 and 6 three times and then row 5 o nce more rejoin yarn under arm pick up 3 sts under the arm to close the gap pick one up from each side of the arm gap and one from r ow 18 ws k2 yo k2tog purl to last 4 sts k4 t he stitch directly below the gap place a sm to indicate the sor r ows 19&20 repeat row 5 and 6 using dpns or magic loop knit 20 rounds decreasing one st u nder the arm by working k2tog on rounds 5 and 10 this completes the increases for the raglan shaping the set up b etween the sms should be 17/26/30/26/17 complete sleeve by working a garter stitch cuff by alternating purl and knit rounds for a total of 6 rounds s titch count 116 c ast off at this point you need to choose whether you want to finish the r epeat for other sleeve sleeves by knitting them flat and seaming them later or knitting t hem in the round finishing weave in ends and add cute buttons sleeves knit flat block lightly r ow 21 rs k43 to the second sm turn r ow 22 ws purl back to first sm p26 knit and purl alternative row for another 18 row working a t otal of 20 row for the sleeve knit 6 row of garter stitch to finish the cuff c ast off rejoin yarn under the arm knit 56 taking you to the fourth sm turn and purl back to third sm p26 for pattern support please visit my group on ravelry knit and purl alternative row for another 18 row working a tikki love or email me at georgie@tikkiknits com t otal of 20 row for the sleeve you can find me on ravelry as tikki knit 6 row of garter stitch to finish the cuff you can also find me at c ast off www tikkiknits com www facebook com/tikkiknits r ejoin yarn under the arm and knit 17 sts to end the round © georgie hallam 2009 all rights reserved pattern is for next row ws k4 purl across joining the front pieces with the personal use only back of the cardigan to complete the row k4 © georgie hallam 2009
